subject: Science
title: DNA: The Ultimate Evidence
description: Learn DNA: The Ultimate Evidence in one minute.

hook.text: Humans share 98.7% of their DNA with chimpanzees. And 60% with bananas.

buildup.text: DNA comparison reveals how closely related any two species are.

discovery.text: The more similar the DNA, the more recently two species shared a common ancestor.

twist.text: Broken genes appear in the same spot in humans and chimps â€” inherited from a shared ancestor.

climax.text: DNA evidence confirms the same family tree that fossils predicted decades earlier.

punchline.text: We share 60% of our DNA with bananas. All life is related. All of it.

quiz.question: What does shared DNA between species demonstrate?
